description: Single storey side/rear (wrap around) extension; first floor side extension
decision_conditions: The development to which this permission relates shall be begun not later than the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Reason: To comply with Section 91 of the Town & Country Planning Act 1990. | The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with drawings / document title number(s): Site Location Plan; D01 (Existing Plans); D02 (Existing Elevations); DD03B (Proposed Ground Floor Plan); DD04B (Proposed First Floor Plan); DD05B (Proposed Roof Plan); DD06B (Proposed Rear Elevation); DD07B (Proposed Side Elevation); DD08B (Proposed Side Elevation); DD09B (Proposed Section A-A); DD10B (Proposed Site Plan); DD11B (Proposed Front Elevation); DD12B (Proposed Section B-B); DD14B (Existing Site Plan); Cover Letter for Householder Planning; Noise Statement dated 24 July 2022; Flood Risk Statement dated 24 July 2022; Biodiversity Statement.

Reason: For the avoidance of doubt, and in the interests of proper planning. | All external materials to be used in the development shall match the appearance of those of the existing building, unless otherwise stated in the submitted application form or approved drawings.

Reason: To ensure that the materials harmonise with the host property and local area, in accordance with Policies D3 & D4 of the London Plan (2021) and Policies 7.4 and 7B of Adopted Ealing Development Management Plan Document (2013).
| No part of the flat roof(s) of the hereby approved development shall be used as or altered to form a balcony, roof terrace/garden or similar amenity area.

Reason: To protect the living conditions of occupants of nearby properties and future occupiers of the development, in accordance with Policies 7A and 7B of the Ealing Development Management DPD (2013).

| The proposed first floor level side elevation window of the hereby approved development shall at no time be openable or glazed, otherwise than in obscured glass, below a minimum height of 1.7 metres (5'7") above the relevant floor level.
Reason: To ensure that the proposed development does not prejudice the amenities of adjoining occupiers, in accordance with Policy 7B of the Ealing Development Management DPD (2013).
